title: Find Two Factors
text: In the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, find 2 numbers that multiply to c and add up to b (Note: This only works when $$a=1)$$

title: Two Factors
text: The two factors that match these rules are -2 and -6

title: Plug into factored form
text: The factored form is $$\left(x+y\right) \left(x+z\right)$$. The value of x can vary depending on the equation (could be u, y, f, etc) and the values of y and z are the two factored numbers.
